title: Phrasal Verbs in Use
description: Master common phrasal verbs to sound more like a native speaker.
info:
Course Info

Dive deep into one of the trickiest parts of English. This course breaks down phrasal verbs into understandable categories and provides plenty of practice.

quiz.question: A phrasal verb combines a verb with a...?
quiz.correctFeedback: Exactly! It's a verb plus a particle like 'up', 'down', 'in', or 'out'.
quiz.incorrectFeedback: That's not it. A phrasal verb uses a particle (a preposition or adverb) to change the verb's meaning.

quiz.question: Which sentence is grammatically correct?

options.text: I will look your dog after.

quiz.correctFeedback: Perfect! With separable phrasal verbs, the pronoun must go in the middle.
quiz.incorrectFeedback: Take another look at the rules for pronouns with separable phrasal verbs.
